message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget, $6,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $8,000?
